name: numap
description:
Numap is a Linux library dedicated to memory profiling based on hardware
performance monitoring unit (PMU).

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: libpfm4
dependencies.description:
libpfm4 is a userspace library to help setup performance events for use
with the perf_events Linux kernel interface.

dependent_to.name: numamma
dependent_to.description:
NumaMMa is a lightweight memory profiler that reports the memory access
patterns of applications.
